thread.title: Japan's Abe under fire over suspected scandal

title: Japan's Abe under fire over suspected scandal
text:
Japan's Abe under fire over suspected scandal Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:14 
References to Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his wife and Finance Minister Taro Aso were removed from documents related to a suspected cronyism scandal, according to documents seen by Reuters. Rosanna Philpott reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
References to Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his wife and Finance Minister Taro Aso were removed from documents related to a suspected cronyism scandal, according to documents seen by Reuters. Rosanna Philpott reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2p8ZMsV
